alert.note: Alert for Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A slow moving, strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Walworth County through 330 PM CDT... At 302 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Delavan, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elkhorn, Delavan, Lake Geneva, Williams Bay, Walworth, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Darien, Como, Abells Corners and Delavan Lake. People attending The Walworth County Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
